synopsis.text:
Legendary forces awaken as Ash, Iris, and Cilan arrive in Eindoak Town, nestled beneath the imposing Sword of the Vale. The trio joins the town's annual battle competition, where Ash emerges victorious with the enigmatic aid of the Mythical Pokémon Victini. This fabled creature shares a deep connection with the ancient Kingdom of the Vale, which once thrived under the protection of Victini and its king.

However, a descendant of the vanished kingdom, Damon, seeks to restore its former glory. He embarks on a quest to harness the mighty Dragon Force, guided by either his Gothitelle or Reuniclus. Traversing icy tundras or barren deserts, Damon summons either the Legendary Zekrom or Reshiram to further his ambitions.

As Damon attempts to seize Victini and unleash the Dragon Force, Eindoak Town teeters on the brink of catastrophe. Ash, united with either Reshiram or Zekrom, must confront Damon and thwart his plans. In this epic adventure, can Ash and his friends save Victini and prevent history from repeating itself? The stage is set for the most thrilling Pokémon journey of all time!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
